languages.text: Судя по оплавленным осколкам, статуя была разрушена выстрелами мультилазерной турели, какие устанавливают на десантные шаттлы.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Выглядит что статуя была разрушена выстрелом мощного орудия из шаттла

languages.text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.
languages.original_text: Судя по оплавленным осколкам, статуя была разрушена выстрелами мультилазерной турели, какие устанавливают на десантные шаттлы.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.
Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.
Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.
Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

languages.text: Angesichts der Tatsache, dass die Stücke am Rand geschmolzen sind, wurde die Statue wohl durch ein Multilasergeschütz zerstört, wie es auf Landungstrupp-Shuttles montiert ist.
languages.original_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Angesichts der Tatsache, dass die Stücke am Rand geschmolzen sind, wurde die Statue wohl durch ein Multilasergeschütz zerstört, wie es auf Landungstrupp-Shuttles montiert ist.

languages.text: Les bords des morceaux sont fondus : il semble que la statue ait été détruite par les tirs d'une tourelle multi-laser, comme celles montées sur les navettes de débarquement.
languages.original_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Les bords des morceaux sont fondus : il semble que la statue ait été détruite par les tirs d'une tourelle multi-laser, comme celles montées sur les navettes de débarquement.

languages.text: 根据碎片边缘的熔化程度来看，这座雕像应该是被登陆部队穿梭机上的多管激光炮塔摧毁的。
languages.original_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: 根据碎片边缘的熔化程度来看，这座雕像应该是被登陆部队穿梭机上的多管激光炮塔摧毁的。

languages.text: 破片の端が溶けている事から判断して、この像は上陸部隊のシャトルに搭載されているタイプのマルチレーザー砲塔が放った炎で破壊されたと考えられます。
languages.original_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: 破片の端が溶けている事から判断して、この像は上陸部隊のシャトルに搭載されているタイプのマルチレーザー砲塔が放った炎で破壊されたと考えられます。

languages.text: A juzgar por el hecho de que las piezas están fundidas en los bordes, la estatua fue destruida con el fuego de una torreta multi-láser de las que se montan en las lanzaderas de aterrizaje.
languages.original_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por el hecho de que las piezas están fundidas en los bordes, la estatua fue destruida con el fuego de una torreta multi-láser de las que se montan en las lanzaderas de aterrizaje.

languages.text: Parçaların kenarlarının erimiş olduğundan yola çıkarak heykelin, çıkarma kuvveti mekiklerine monte edilen tipte çok lazerli bir taretten çıkan ateşle yok edildiği anlaşılıyor.
languages.original_text: Judging by the fact that the pieces are molten at the edges, the statue was destroyed with fire from a multi-laser turret of the type that is mounted on landing-force shuttles.

traits.locale_text: Parçaların kenarlarının erimiş olduğundan yola çıkarak heykelin, çıkarma kuvveti mekiklerine monte edilen tipte çok lazerli bir taretten çıkan ateşle yok edildiği anlaşılıyor.
